title: [BUG] Rendering a SKXamlCanvas on Android together with AcrylicBrush looks weird
body:
**Description**

Unfortunately this is a duplicate issue - the original one is posted on the [Uno-Repo here](https://github.com/unoplatform/uno/issues/7255).

I'm not exactly sure, why and where my error comes from. The linked issue also links to a [sample repo](https://github.com/TopperDEL/UnoAcrylicBrushSkiaError). Basically it works on UWP but brings weird results on Android (did not test iOs yet) where the image seems to be smaller/with wrong proportions below the AcrylicBrush.

Any help greatly appreciated! This is currently the last issue blocking me from releasing an app to the public.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  SkiaSharp 2.80.2 and SkiaSharp.View.Uno 2.80.3
- IDE:  VS 2022
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Android: 11.0 
- Target Devices:   
  - Huawei P30 Pro
  
**Screenshots**

Video is in the linked issue: https://github.com/unoplatform/uno/issues/7255

**Reproduction Link**

https://github.com/TopperDEL/UnoAcrylicBrushSkiaError
